rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall designed for natural light with glass panels and Vastu compliant south-west orientation.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: An open living area with abundant windows facing east to ensure early morning sunlight, following Vastu guidelines for prosperity.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: A dining space adjacent to the living room, designed with a central window ensuring natural light and proper air circulation.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen located in the north-east quadrant as per Vastu principles for health and energy flow. Equipped with ample ventilation.

rooms.name: Central Courtyard
rooms.description: An open central courtyard acting as a light well and communal space, ensuring natural light penetration to adjacent rooms while providing a cooling effect.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: A compact guest bathroom with proper ventilation, adhering to Vastu guidelines for balance and symmetry.

openings.description: Main entrance door aligning with Vastu principles.
Private bathroom door ensuring privacy and proper flow.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A spacious master bedroom with large windows on the south-west side for optimal natural light and proper ventilation, adhering to Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Study/Office
rooms.description: A dedicated study area in the north-east portion of the level, ensuring focus and energy flow as per Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: Interior door ensuring a quiet study environment.

rooms.name: Second Bedroom
rooms.description: An additional bedroom designed with similar principles for natural light and ventilation, placed to maintain Vastu balance.

rooms.name: Balcony/Veranda
rooms.description: A communal balcony offering an outdoor space with a view of the central courtyard, promoting natural light and air circulation.

openings.description: Exterior door ensuring easy access to the balcony.
